label: Dexterity
flavor: You imbue the item with deft dexterity.
level-8-speed: Once per day, you can use a single action activation with manipulate trait to gain a +10-foot status bonus to all your Speeds for 10 minutes.
level-14-speed: Once per day, you can use a single action activation with manipulate trait to gain a +20-foot status bonus to all your Speeds for 10 minutes. While activated, you gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk}.
level-17-apex: When you invest the item, you either increase your Dexterity attribute by +1 or increase it to +4, whichever would give you a higher value. The item gains the apex trait.
level-20-speed: Once per day, you can use a single action activation with manipulate trait to gain a +30-foot status bonus to all your Speeds for 10 minutes. While activated, you gain the effects of both @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk}.
